LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTickled.stages.0.label: tickled and giggling
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTickled.stages.0.descript: Someone tickled me and made me giggle! Hehe!
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerSpunAround.label: spun around
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerSpunAround.stages.0.label: spun around
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerSpunAround.stages.0.descr: Someone spun me around! The world is spinning!

LanguageData.RimTalk_PlayedWithToddler.stages.0.label: played with toddler
LanguageData.RimTalk_PlayedWithToddler.stages.0.descr: I played with a little one. Their laughter is so heartwarming!
